tool_description: Performs comprehensive physical inspection of returned items to assess overall condition, completeness, and any visible issues.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the returned item

inspector_id.description: ID of the staff member conducting inspection

item_category.description: Product category: electronics, clothing, home_goods, books, toys, jewelry

original_packaging.description: Whether item is returned in original packaging

accessories_included.description: Whether all original accessories are included

tags_attached.description: Whether original tags are still attached

visible_wear.description: Level of visible wear: none, minimal, moderate, significant, excessive

functionality_test.description: Functionality test result: passed, failed, not_applicable

error_messages: Invalid item_id: Item ID must be a non-empty string and exist in the return system.
Invalid inspector_id: Inspector ID must be a valid staff member identifier.
Invalid inspection_date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
Invalid item_category: Category must be one of [electronics, clothing, home_goods, books, toys, jewelry].
Invalid visible_wear level: Must be one of [none, minimal, moderate, significant, excessive].
Invalid functionality_test result: Must be one of [passed, failed, not_applicable].
usage: Provide all required parameters after physically examining the returned item. Use for systematic inspection before condition assessment and refund processing.

completeness_status.description: Assessment of item completeness: complete, missing_accessories, missing_packaging

recommended_action.description: Recommended next action: approve_refund, partial_refund, reject_return, further_assessment
